00021 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 //  A define in the build for each project is also used to control whether
00023 //  the export keyword is from the project's viewpoint or the client's.
00024 //  These defines provide the platform specific keywords that they need
00025 //  to do this.
00026 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT
00028 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT
00029 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT_FUNCTION(T) T XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT
00030 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT_FUNCTION(T) T XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT
00031 
00032 
00033

00036 #define XALAN_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00037 #define XALAN_NO_STD_ALLOCATORS
00038 #define XALAN_NO_USING_DECLARATION
00039 #endif
